      • getHistory

        public void getHistory​(android.app.Activity activity)
                throws org.json.JSONException,
                       java.io.IOException
        Gets history from a jsonfile. The objectives is to retrieve the data contains inside a JSONObject, by getting the name of the attributes.
        Parameters:
        activity - the activity
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - the json exception
        java.io.IOException - the io exception

      • saveHistory

        public void saveHistory​(android.app.Activity activity)
                 throws org.json.JSONException,
                        java.io.IOException
        Save every Day object contain in history to a .json history file. We convert each Day to a JSONObject before adding them to a JSONArray.
        Parameters:
        activity - the activity
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - the json exception
        java.io.IOException - the io exception
